# Acanthastrea

## *Acanthastrea echinata*

|  |  |
|------------------------------------|------------------------------------|
| ![](../images/echinata.jpg){width="400"} | ![](../images/echinata-trace.jpg){width="400"} |

```{r}
#| fig-width: 14
#| fig-height: 3
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(coralcolors)

echinata <- c("#2D4F68", "#0570C2","#039FFF","#018CAF","#00B09C", "#F9B908", "#A84743")
show_colors(echinata, nrow=1)
```
